villager.name: Villager
villager.description: Find the Werewolves and kill them, before they kill you.

werewolf.name: Werewolf
werewolf.description: You wake up each night together with the other Werewolves and choose 1 victim, which you kill.

seer.name: Seer
seer.description: You choose 1 player every night. You learn whether the player is a Werewolf or not.

villagers.name: Villagers
villagers.description: You win if you kill all the Werewolves.

werewolves.name: Werewolves
werewolves.description: You win if you kill all the Villagers.

lovers.name: Lovers
lovers.description: You win if you and your lover are the only survivors.
